arts.ttl: Hull City rocked by double new signing blow ahead of Stoke City trip
arts.sum: Rushworth, who signed on transfer deadline day from Brighton was absent from City's squad because of what Tim Walter described as a 'bruise' while Hughes was admitted to hospital on Friday with a stomach complaint, believed to be in his appendix. Hull City have been dealt a double blow after both Carl Rushworth and Charlie Hughes missed Friday night's 2-0 home defeat to Sheffield United.

arts.ttl: Hull City 0-2 Sheffield United: Blades record back-to-back clean sheet victories
arts.sum: Sheffield United recorded another 2-0 victory on their travels, but they were tested by Hull City on Friday evening. Gustavo Hamer broke the deadlock in the first half with a powerful low driven effort into the bottom left corner from a tight angle on the right of the box. Substitute Sam McCallum doubled United’s lead […] The post Hull City 0-2 Sheffield United: Blades record back-to-back clean sheet victories appeared first on Sheff United Way.

arts.ttl: Tim Walter offers verdict on Hull City's Sheffield United loss and his late booking
arts.sum: If you make easy mistakes, you will lose this game, but it depends on us and that's the good thing that I know. Maybe we can play a better finishing pass, especially in the first half, we had so many chances to score, but we didn't because the last ball was often not good.

arts.ttl: Chaotic Hull City beaten again as Tim Walter's winless start continues against Sheffield United
arts.sum: City went short, Belloumi was overpowered 25 yards from the Blades' goal and they surged forward with three players on just Ryan Giles, which allowed Hamer to race onto Callum O'Hare's pass into the box and fire across Pandur into the bottom corner. Debutant Mohamed Belloumi was overpowered 25 yards from the Blades' goal, and a few seconds later, a three-on-one situation in United's favour saw Callum O'Hare feed Gustavo Hamer to slam into the corner.

arts.ttl: Hull City player ratings vs Sheffield United as debutant catches the eye amid latest defeat
arts.sum: City's chaotic style was naturally their undoing after 15 minutes when a really good attack from the hosts saw them robbed outside the Blades box, and from there, a quick counter-attack saw Callum O'Hare feed Gustavo Hamer to rattle in the opening goal. A second half corner for the Tigers ended up in the back of their net when substitute Sam McCallum came off the bench to finish another swift counter-attack and kill the game off.

arts.ttl: Sheffield United climb to third in Championship with win at struggling Hull
arts.sum: Gustavo Hamer and Sam McCallum were on target for Chris Wilder’s Blades.

arts.ttl: Unique Sheffield United 24-25 Third Goalkeeper Kit
arts.sum: Along with the 24-25 third jersey, Errea also launched the Sheffield United 24-25 goalkeeper strip with the same design, but with quite impressive color changes.

arts.ttl: “We’re looking to continue in the way we left off” – Chris Wilder bangs drum ahead of Sheffield United’s visit to Hull
arts.sum: Sheffield United head to East Yorkshire on Friday to face Tim Walter’s Hull City as they return from the international break. The Blades, led by Chris Wilder, come into the match in solid form, having secured two wins and two draws from their opening four fixtures. In contrast, Hull City have endured a slow start […] The post “We’re looking to continue in the way we left off” – Chris Wilder bangs drum ahead of Sheffield United’s visit to Hull appeared first on Sheff United Way.

arts.ttl: Tim Walter told what Hull City must do ahead of Sheffield United test
arts.sum: New head coach Tim Walter is without a win since taking charge on July 1 and will know the importance of breaking his duck and giving City fans something to cheer about, having not tasted victory anywhere since late April, something he'll be desperate to do, according to David Prutton, who says the winless run need to be halted. City suffered their first league defeat of the season last time out when they succumbed to a 2-0 defeat at Leeds United, bringing an end to three successive draws to kick off the new Championship campaign.
